DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study : - To explore antitumor activity MEDI-522 ± DTIC patient metastatic melanoma . - To determine safety MEDI-522 ± DTIC patient population .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating The Antitumor Activity Of MEDI-522 With Or Without Dacarbazine In Patients With Metastatic Melanoma
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase II , randomize , open-label , two-arm , multicenter study MEDI 522 ± DTIC previously untreated ( adjuvant immunotherapy ) patient Stage IV metastatic melanoma ( AJCC stag ) .
